description:
+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

People who view a web video are 64% more likely to purchase than other site visitors!

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

You can increase sales with a great promo video! If you want to drive traffic and increase conversion rates for your product or service, there is no better way than with a promotional video.

In this course you will go step by step through the process of creating a promo video that your audience will love.

You will learn effective sales and script writing techniques, what equipment to use and how to save money when choosing it, and how to film and edit to create a final product that is sure to keep your audience engaged and boost your sales numbers.

The course is geared towards anyone who wants to increase their sales through the use of promotional videos.

There are currently more than 25 lectures and quizzes designed to take you step by step through making your first video. There are a total of four sections designed to completed at your own pace. Take as long as you like. You are in control of your learning experience.

Once the course is completed you will have the skills necessary to create an outstanding video that you can place wherever you see fit.

Students get lifetime access to the course! Enroll now and start creating your video today. Every second you wait is costing you money!
title: Promo Videos: Increase Sales with a Quality Promo Video
